description:
Zordle Word Game Guide -Tips and Strategies to Help You Solve More Puzzles

Here are the steps and tips to help you play and win at Zordle:

What is Zordle?

Zordle is a word puzzle game similar to Wordle and other word games where you have to guess a secret word in a set number of tries. In Zordle, you have 13 guesses to figure out a 5-7 letter word.

Before you play • Make sure to refresh your browser before playing a new game to start with a fresh, randomly selected word. • Write down your guesses on pen and paper. This can help you eliminate letters and identify patterns.

Start with common letters and short words Start by guessing short words with common letters like S, A, R, E, and T. This will reveal some of the letters in the answer word and give you clues early on.

Use the hints effectively Pay close attention to the color codes for each letter - yellow means the letter is in the word but in the wrong spot, and green means the letter is in the right spot.

Try variations of previous guesses If one of your guesses is close but not correct, try minor variations like switching the positions of two letters or swapping in a different vowel.

Avoid repeating letters Don't guess words with letters you've already eliminated. Cross out letters on your sheet as you go to keep track of which ones can't be in the answer.

Get creative in the later guesses On your last few attempts, take risks with less common words, combinations of letters, and plural forms to try and uncover the answer.

Use a word list as a last resort If you're really stuck, search online for "5 letter word list" or "6 letter word list" to find words you haven't thought of yet.
name: zordle
